blocks.name: linply1
blocks.content: A term of the form ` x - C ` is a (univariate) polynomial, also called "linear polynomial". (Part of ~ ply1remlem ). (Contributed by AV, 3-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm linply1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cpl1, c3))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cv1, c3))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(csg, c2))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cascl, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c5, c6, cfv(c7, c8)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c8, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, crg))
} = {
  syl5eqel(c0, c1, co(c5, c6, cfv(c7, c8)), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c5, c6, cfv(c7, c8)), c1), wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c5, c1), wcel(cfv(c7, c8), c1))
  3syl(w0, wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c3, crg), wcel(c2, crg))
  ply1ring(c3, c2)
  ringgrp(c2)
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, c1), wcel(c3, crg))
  vr1cl(c3, c5, c1, c2)
  ffvelrnd(c7, c8, c1, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wf(c7, c4, c1), wcel(c3, crg))
  ply1sclf(c3, c7, c4, c1, c2)
  grpsubcl(c2, c5, c1, cfv(c7, c8), c6)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm linply1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(Poly1 ` c3)
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ c5 =(var1 ` c3)
  ⊣ c6 =(-g ` c2)
  ⊣ c7 =(algSc ` c2)
  ⊣ c0 =(c5[c6](c7 ` c8))
  ⊣ (w0 → c8 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ Ring)
} = {
  syl5eqel(c0, c1, (c5[c6](c7 ` c8)), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, (c5[c6](c7 ` c8))∈ c1, c2 ∈ Grp, c5 ∈ c1, (c7 ` c8)∈ c1)
  3syl(w0, c2 ∈ Grp, c3 ∈ Ring, c2 ∈ Ring)
  ply1ring(c3, c2)
  ringgrp(c2)
  syl(w0, c5 ∈ c1, c3 ∈ Ring)
  vr1cl(c3, c5, c1, c2)
  ffvelrnd(c7, c8, c1, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, (c7 : c4 → c1), c3 ∈ Ring)
  ply1sclf(c3, c7, c4, c1, c2)
  grpsubcl(c2, c5, c1, (c7 ` c8), c6)
}

blocks.name: lineval
blocks.content: A term of the form ` x - C ` evaluated for ` x = V ` results in ` V - C ` (part of ~ ply1remlem ). (Contributed by AV, 3-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm lineval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), c2), co(c2, cfv(csg, c3), c4)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cpl1, c3))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cv1, c3))
  -| wceq(c9, cfv(csg, c5))
  -| wceq(c10, cfv(cascl, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c8, c9, cfv(c10, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c7))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ce1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, ccrg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c7))
} = {
  syl5eq(cfv(cfv(c0, c1), c2), co(c2, cfv(csg, c3), c4), cfv(cfv(c0, co(c8, c9, cfv(c10, c4))), c2), w0)
  fveq1i(cfv(c0, c1), c2, cfv(c0, co(c8, c9, cfv(c10, c4))))
  fveq2i(c0, c1, co(c8, c9, cfv(c10, c4)))
  simprd(w0, wceq(cfv(cfv(c0, co(c8, c9, cfv(c10, c4))), c2), co(c2, cfv(csg, c3), c4)), wcel(co(c8, c9, cfv(c10, c4)), c6))
  evl1subd(c8, c9, cfv(c10, c4), c6, c0, c2, c2, cfv(csg, c3), c4, c3, c5, c7, w0)
  evl1vard(c8, c6, c0, c2, c3, c7, c5, w0)
  evl1scad(c10, c4, c6, c0, c2, c3, c5, c7, w0)
  eqid(cfv(csg, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lineval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0 ` c1)` c2)=(c2[(-g ` c3)]c4))
  ⊣ c5 =(Poly1 ` c3)
  ⊣ c6 =(Base ` c5)
  ⊣ c7 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ c8 =(var1 ` c3)
  ⊣ c9 =(-g ` c5)
  ⊣ c10 =(algSc ` c5)
  ⊣ c1 =(c8[c9](c10 ` c4))
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c7)
  ⊣ c0 =(eval1 ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ CRing)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c7)
} = {
  syl5eq(((c0 ` c1)` c2), (c2[(-g ` c3)]c4), ((c0 `(c8[c9](c10 ` c4)))` c2), w0)
  fveq1i((c0 ` c1), c2, (c0 `(c8[c9](c10 ` c4))))
  fveq2i(c0, c1, (c8[c9](c10 ` c4)))
  simprd(w0, ((c0 `(c8[c9](c10 ` c4)))` c2)=(c2[(-g ` c3)]c4), (c8[c9](c10 ` c4))∈ c6)
  evl1subd(c8, c9, (c10 ` c4), c6, c0, c2, c2, (-g ` c3), c4, c3, c5, c7, w0)
  evl1vard(c8, c6, c0, c2, c3, c7, c5, w0)
  evl1scad(c10, c4, c6, c0, c2, c3, c5, c7, w0)
  eqid((-g ` c3))
}

blocks.name: zringsubgval
blocks.content: Subtraction in the ring of integers. (Contributed by AV, 3-Aug-2019.)

blocks.name: linevalexample
blocks.content: The polynomial ` x - 3 ` over ` ZZ ` evaluated for ` x = 5 ` results in 2. (Contributed by AV, 3-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm linevalexample(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wceq(cfv(cfv(c0, co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, nat3))), nat5), nat2)
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cpl1, zring))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cv1, zring))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(csg, c4))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cascl, c4))
  -| wceq(c6, co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, nat3)))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ce1, zring))
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(cfv(cfv(c0, co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, nat3))), nat5), nat2), wceq(c6, co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, nat3))))
  3eqtr2i(cfv(cfv(c0, co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, nat3))), nat5), nat2, co(nat5, cfv(csg, zring), nat3), co(nat5, cmin, nat3))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cfv(c0, co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, nat3))), nat5), co(nat5, cfv(csg, zring), nat3)), wcel(zring, ccrg))
  zringcrng()
  lineval(c0, co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, nat3)), nat5, zring, nat3, c4, c5, cz, c1, c2, c3, wcel(zring, ccrg))
  zringbas()
  eqid(co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, nat3)))
  a1i(wcel(zring, ccrg), wcel(nat3, cz))
  id(wcel(zring, ccrg))
  a1i(wcel(zring, ccrg), wcel(nat5, cz))
  mp2an(wceq(co(nat5, cmin, nat3), co(nat5, cfv(csg, zring), nat3)), wcel(nat5, cz), wcel(nat3, cz))
  nn0zi(nat5)
  5nn0()
  3z()
  zringsubgval(nat5, nat3, cfv(csg, zring))
  eqid(cfv(csg, zring))
  subaddrii(nat5, nat3, nat2)
  5cn()
  3cn()
  2cn()
  3p2e5()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm linevalexample(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ ((c0 `(c1[c2](c3 ` 3)))` 5)= 2
  ⊣ c4 =(Poly1 ` ZZring)
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ c1 =(var1 ` ZZring)
  ⊣ c2 =(-g ` c4)
  ⊣ c3 =(algSc ` c4)
  ⊣ c6 =(c1[c2](c3 ` 3))
  ⊣ c0 =(eval1 ` ZZring)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 `(c1[c2](c3 ` 3)))` 5)= 2, c6 =(c1[c2](c3 ` 3)))
  3eqtr2i(((c0 `(c1[c2](c3 ` 3)))` 5), nat2, (5[(-g ` ZZring)]3), (5[-]3))
  ax-mp(((c0 `(c1[c2](c3 ` 3)))` 5)=(5[(-g ` ZZring)]3), ZZring ∈ CRing)
  zringcrng()
  lineval(c0, (c1[c2](c3 ` 3)), nat5, zring, nat3, c4, c5, cz, c1, c2, c3, ZZring ∈ CRing)
  zringbas()
  eqid((c1[c2](c3 ` 3)))
  a1i(ZZring ∈ CRing, 3 ∈ ℤ)
  id(ZZring ∈ CRing)
  a1i(ZZring ∈ CRing, 5 ∈ ℤ)
  mp2an((5[-]3)=(5[(-g ` ZZring)]3), 5 ∈ ℤ, 3 ∈ ℤ)
  nn0zi(nat5)
  5nn0()
  3z()
  zringsubgval(nat5, nat3, (-g ` ZZring))
  eqid((-g ` ZZring))
  subaddrii(nat5, nat3, nat2)
  5cn()
  3cn()
  2cn()
  3p2e5()
}
